to me any particular 
view about Daphnia (which 
I had not then carefully examined,
in fact) and that I merely 
draw attention to certain 
analogies between the process 
which I observed in <u>Lacinularia<\u>
and that which accords to the 
received views at the time 
I wrote, obtained in Daphnia.
Thomas H. Huxley 
The Committee of Papers 
Royal Society
